content: निर्धूत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Shaken off, removed; dispelled. {@--2@} Deserted; rejected. {@--3@} Deprived of, bereft. {@--4@} Avoided. {@--5@} Refuted. {@--6@} Destroyed. {@--7@} Broken, divided. {@--8@} Suffered, undergone. {@--9@} Cast off or away, thrown away. --तः A man deserted by his relations and friends.
